com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh

Class TextureColorMaterialBatchRenderer<M extends TextureColorMaterial>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.GraphicsBatchRenderer<M>
      • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.RectangleBatchRenderer<M>
        • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.TextureMaterialBatchRendererBase<M>
          • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.TextureColorMaterialBatchRenderer<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - TextureColorMaterial

    public class TextureColorMaterialBatchRenderer<M extends TextureColorMaterial>
extends TextureMaterialBatchRendererBase<M>
    TextureColorMaterialBatchRenderer allows rendering batches of up to 32 rectangles with TextureColorMaterial in one draw call. Each rectangle has its own translation, rotation and scale.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

      • draw

        public void draw(Vector2 position,
        Vector2 scale,
        Vector2 origin,
        float rotation,
        Camera camera)
        Description copied from class: RectangleBatchRenderer
        Adds a rectangle to this batch.
        If the batch was full, it will be rendered in one draw call and it will be left empty. Then, the specified rectangle will be added to this batch.
        Specified by:
        draw in class RectangleBatchRenderer<M extends TextureColorMaterial>
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        scale - Scale.
        origin - Origin of the rectangle (value between 0.0f and 1.0f).
        rotation - Rotation angle around the origin.
        camera - Camera.
